item.title: code update
item.description:
code update by RDG :
uses locationmap for resource resolution.

item.title: admin update
item.description:
admin update by RDG :
Changed plugin name to conform to naming conventions.

item.title: Document Properties add
item.description:
Document Properties add by js :
Put Description from Excel document properties as a paragraph at the beginning of the document

item.title: Document Properties add
item.description:
Document Properties add by js :
Put Description from Excel document properties as a paragraph at the beginning of the document

item.title: Figure fix
item.description:
Figure fix by js :
Removed table around figures

item.title: Stylesheet add
item.description:
Stylesheet add by js :
New feature: put id=sheet name in to allow #id links

item.title: Stylesheet add
item.description:
Stylesheet add by js :
New feature: content containing .png, .gif or .jpg is displayed as image; use path below image directory

item.title: xsl add
item.description:
xsl add by RDG :
New feature: 'text' in first column to create descriptive text. Thanks to Johannes Schaefer.

item.title: caption fix
item.description:
caption fix by RDG :
Minor issue: captions are now included even if Excel skips cell at position three and writes weird "ss:Index=4". Thanks to Johannes Schaefer.

item.title: fix (bug FOR-432)
item.description:
fix by RDG (fixes bug FOR-432)
:
Fixed bug: input.xmap pointed to the project's resources dir not the plugin's. So, plugin documentation worked fine, but any other project didn't. Thanks to Johannes Schaefer.

item.title: admin add (bug FOR-373)
item.description:
admin add by RDG (fixes bug FOR-373)
:
Initial plugin code. Thanks to Johannes Schaefer.

code update by RDG :
uses locationmap for resource resolution.
